transcripts.text: But the timing of the rapture.  Now, there's a pre-tribulation theory, there is the mid-tribulation theory, and the post-tribulation.  Which one do you believe?  Is that too political?

But there are six specific scriptures that teach a three and one half year tribulation.  Daniel 7, 25, the antichrist will make war against the saints for time, times, half a time.  Revelation 13, 5, power was given unto the beast to continue 42 months.  He made war against the saints and overcame them.
